title: EconomicEvent
description: An inflow or outflow of an economic resource in relation to a process and/or exchange.

action.description: Relates a process input or output to a verb, such as consume, produce, work, improve, etc.

quantifiedAs.description: The quantity and unit of the event. This is the quantity that could be used to increment or decrement a resource, depending on the type of resource and type of event.

resourceInventoriedAs.description: The economic resource that is decremented or incremented by the economic event, or just what the economic event is about.

provider.description: The economic agent from whom the economic event is initiated.

receiver.description: The economic agent whom the economic event is for.

hasBeginning.description: The starting date and optionally time of the economic event.

hasEnd.description: The ending date and optionally time of the economic event.

hasPointInTime.description: The economic event occurs at this date/time instant.

before.description: The economic event occurs before this date/time.

after.description: The economic event occurs after this date/time.

inputOf.description: The process for which this economic event describes an input.

outputOf.description: The process for which this economic event describes an output.

under.description: Reference to an agreement between agents which specifies the rules or policies which govern this event.
